alert.note: Alert for Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 06 at 5:01PM MST until December 07 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, |* Insert hazard descriptor *| expected. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 11 AM MST Wednesday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 6 AM to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday evening and Wednesday morning commutes. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera
